stages.logText: Leta in Crossglen village wants me to look for her husband Oromir.
I have found Oromir in Crossglen village, hiding from his wife Leta.
I have told Leta that Oromir is hiding in Crossglen village.
I have found Oromir in Crossglen village, hiding from his wife Leta, but I promised him that I would not tell Leta of his whereabouts.
I have found Oromir behind the Crossglen village inn, hiding from his wife Leta, but I promised him that I would not tell Leta of his whereabouts.
I have found Oromir in Crossglen village behind a haystack, hiding from his wife Leta, but I promised him that I would not tell Leta of his whereabouts.
Even after all my help, Oromir was still brought back home to Leta.
